thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Em

author: Em
title: Em
text: Our Account Manager Christian was extremely helpful and efficient. There was quite a lot of back and forth between Christian and our team when we were deciding which USB design to go for, as well as the order quantity. Christian was patient throughout this process, and always responded to my emails quickly. I also really appreciated the free service that Flashbay offers in which their design team will do a PDF proof, showing your logo on your chosen USB.
